sourcesContent:
<Grid.Column style={{ float: 'right', width: '30%' }}>
  <Container style={{ marginLeft: '50px' }}>
    <Header as='h2' color='black' textAlign='center'>
      Add Candidate
    </Header>
    <Card style={{ width: '100%' }}>
      <Form size='large' style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
        <Form.Input
          fluid
          label='Name:'
          placeholder='Enter candidate name'
          onChange={event => this.setState({ cand_name: event.target.value })}
        />

        <Form.Field>
          <label>Description:</label>
          <Form.TextArea
            placeholder='Describe the candidate here...'
            onChange={event => this.setState({ cand_desc: event.target.value })}
          />
        </Form.Field>

        <Form.Input
          fluid
          label='E-mail ID:'
          id="email"
          placeholder="Enter candidate email"
          type="email"
        />

        <Form.Field>
          <label>Candidate Image:</label>
          <input
            type="file"
            onChange={event => {
              const file = event.target.files[0];
              if (file) {
                const reader = new window.FileReader();
                reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);
                reader.onloadend = () => this.convertToBuffer(reader);
              }
            }}
          />
        </Form.Field>

        <Button
          primary
          fluid
          onClick={this.onSubmit}
          loading={this.state.loading}
          style={{ marginTop: '15px' }}
        >
          Register Candidate
        </Button>

        {this.state.useSampleData && (
          <Message info style={{ marginTop: '15px' }}>
            <Icon name='info circle' />
            This is a demonstration with sample data
          </Message>
        )}
      </Form>
    </Card>
  </Container>
</Grid.Column>
